pr_title: #292  Check if Keychain was locked and try to unlock it

timeline.message: #292 Check if Keychain was locked and try to unlock it if codesign fails

timeline.bodyText:
That sounds like the operation is halted, but from the code it seems you're continuing trying to solve this.
It would be good if the developer got feedback (e.g. "You will know be shown a dialog" or so)
timeline.author: johanvos

timeline.message: Fix message shown to the user
